titleStmt.title: The controversie debated about the reuerend gesture of kneeling in the act of receiuing the holy communion. By Iames Wats, minister of Gods word at Woodnosborough in Kent: and sometime fellow of Magdalene Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Wats, James, d. 1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. I[aggard] for Walter Burre, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A treatise concerning kneeling at the communion.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crane
